attributes.action: Diana Fund - being misused by Left Wingers to fund pro-immigration campaign
attributes.additional_details: The Princess Diana Fund is being misused for Left Wingers such as Migrate Rights Network, Observatory, etc to promote pro-immigration in the Changing Minds project.   This is a disgrace as the tax payer contributed to the Princes Diana Fund for good causes.  I want the Government to stop these people and other groups  stealing from these charities to fund their own political propaganda campaigns.
